item.createmechanicalcompanion.mechanica:
§8Spawns a §7Mechanical Wolf§r§8 to protect the wearer.
You can open the module interface by right clicking it or heal it by using a wrench.
When the §7Mechanical Wolf§r§8 dies, it will respawn with the modules equipped after a short cooldown.

item.createmechanicalcompanion.mounted_c: §8Adds a mounted crossbow to the §7Mechanical Wolf §8that only damages its target.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.tesla_tai: §8Adds a Tesla Tail to the §7Mechanical Wolf §8that damages its attackers.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.booster_r: §8Adds boost of speed to the §7Mechanical Wolf §8when it finds a target.
item.createmechanicalcompanion.quantum_d: §8Allows the §7Mechanical Wolf §8to teleport to its target.
